attributes.action: gangs of youths caysing damage and stealing from peoples property.
attributes.additional_details: Please sign the petition to stop the gangs of youths congregating in Mooreclose Middleton area.  There has been too many burglaries and too much criminal damage done to properties. The council need to start fencing off areas where they all meet up, they need securing & to patrol this area more.  Its nearly everyday where you here off crime being commited in our community & it is only us can change this!!

rejection.details: This appears to be a local authority issue in which central government cannot intervene.
